DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Participant Administration Gender Code Gender Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity._Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data._information relating to gender.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Participant Administration Gender Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity._Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research.:Someone who takes part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
Someone who takes part in an activity.

Property.preferredDefinition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:The assemblage of properties that distinguish people on the basis of their societal roles.:A system, often of numbered categories, for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.

Characteristics of people that are socially constructed, including norms, behaviors, and roles based on sex. As a social construct, gender varies from society to society and can change over time. (Adapted from WHO.)
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces sperm. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, cultural gender role distinctions, or both.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.

Concepts.definition: A person who belongs to the sex that normally produces ova. The term is used to indicate biological sex distinctions, or cultural gender role distinctions, or both.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
